an10.77:1.3: Dhaṁsī ca, pagabbho ca, tintiṇo ca, mahagghaso ca, luddo ca, akāruṇiko ca, dubbalo ca, oravitā ca, muṭṭhassati ca, necayiko ca—
an10.77:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgato kāko.
an10.77:1.5: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhu.
an10.77:1.7: Dhaṁsī ca, pagabbho ca, tintiṇo ca, mahagghaso ca, luddo ca, akāruṇiko ca, dubbalo ca, oravitā ca, muṭṭhassati ca, necayiko ca—
an10.77:1.8: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgato pāpabhikkhū”ti.
